note.p: Education: Trinity College, Cambridge; BA (1677), MA (1680)
Career: Fellow of Trinity (1679); Mathematics Master at Christ's Hospital
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Taylor; Venn
Authority: Altname, and dates from Hunter
References: D T Whiteside, 'The Prehistory of the Principia from 1664 to 1686' in NR 1991 vol 45 pp 11-61
